lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev has cited East Germany's cautious industrial decentralisation as an alternative to the Hungarian model based on Western-style market economics.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Factory investment funds would be drawn from profits above certain minimum returns pledged to the state under annual plans and from amortisation -- funds the factory is allowed to keep to compensate for depreciation in the cost of machinery.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "This new regulation is part of our general investment policy," Berliner Zeitung said, citing the growing importance of robots and high technology rather than the large-scale plant construction of the 1950s and 1960s.
